title: An electrocardiogram-based AI algorithm for early detection of pulmonary hypertension
details: HM DuBrock, TE Wagner, K Carlson, CL Carpenter… - European Respiratory …, 2024
abstract: Background Early diagnosis of pulmonary hypertension (PH) is critical for effective treatment and management. We aimed to develop and externally validate an artificial intelligence algorithm that could serve as a PH screening tool, based on analysis of a …
